title: Please help me!!!!!!
content:
Can anyone help me with this font??? I used this for my friends label at her shop and now I have lost all my files (hard disk crushed)..... !!!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820022515/http:/typophile.com/files/font_79.png) | 9.91 KB |
author: george_anton

comments.content: best i can find is [Thalia](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820022515/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/profonts/profonts_thalia_medium_ot_std/?s=c), although to get the result above you would have to do some editing.
